createBoard.description: Create a new Pinterest board for organizing Pins.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the board (max 180 characters).

props.name: description
props.description: Optional description for your board.

props.name: privacy
props.description: Board privacy setting (auto-set to "PROTECTED" for ad-only boards).

props.name: is_ads_only
props.description: Create an ad-only board that can only store promotional Pins. Note: Board name will become "Ad-only Pins" and privacy will be set to "PROTECTED".

createPin.description: Upload an image or video to create a new Pin on a board.

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the Pin (max 100 characters).

props.name: description
props.description: The description of the Pin (max 800 characters).

props.name: media_source_type
props.description: The type of media source for the Pin.

props.name: media_url
props.description: The URL of the image or video to upload. Must be a valid URL.

props.name: link
props.description: The destination URL that the Pin will link to when clicked.

props.name: dominant_color
props.description: The dominant color of the Pin as a hex color code (e.g., "#6E7874").

props.name: alt_text
props.description: Alternative text for accessibility and screen readers (max 500 characters).

props.name: parent_pin_id
props.description: The ID of the original Pin if this is a saved/repinned Pin.

props.name: sponsor_id
props.description: The sponsor account ID for paid partnership content. Available only to select users in closed beta.

props.name: note
props.description: A private note for this Pin that only you can see.

props.name: is_removable
props.description: Set to true to create an ad-only Pin that can be easily removed.

findBoardByName.description: The search term to find boards (required).

props.name: query
props.description: The search term to find boards (required).

props.name: bookmark
props.description: Pagination bookmark from previous response.

findPin.description: Search for Pins using title, description, or keywords.

props.name: query
props.description: Search terms for pin titles, descriptions, or tags. You can also search using comma-separated pin IDs.

props.name: bookmark
props.description: Bookmark token from previous search results for pagination.

props.name: max_results
props.description: Maximum number of pins to return (useful for large result sets).

updateBoard.description: The new name of the board (max 180 characters). Leave empty to keep current name.

props.name: name
props.description: The new name of the board (max 180 characters). Leave empty to keep current name.

props.name: description
props.description: The new description of the board (max 500 characters). Leave empty to keep current description.

props.name: privacy
props.description: Update board privacy setting. Leave empty to keep current setting.

newBoard.description: Fires when a new board is created in the account.

props.name: privacy_filter
props.description: Filter boards by privacy setting (optional).

props.name: page_size
props.description: Number of boards to fetch per page (1-250, default: 25).

newFollower.description: Triggers when a user gains a new follower.

newPinOnBoard.description: Fires when a new Pin is added to a specific board.

props.name: creative_types
props.description: Filter by specific pin types. Leave empty to watch all types.
